# testapp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of testapp is to provide the UI to work with data hosted elsewhere.

## Installation

``` r
install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maurolepore/testapp")
```

## Example

```
testapp::run_app("/")
```
